This website is made using Phenomic. You can check out the source code of this documentation as an example as well as examples in the Showcase.

#Automatic deployment

  • Automatic deployment with GitHub Pages (gh-pages)
  • Automatic deployment with Netlify

#CMS

  • Use Netlify CMS to manage your content
  • Use Prose to manage your content hosted on GitHub

#Internationalization

  • Use React-int to internationalize your content
